products.title: Kasian, Red - Roman Blind
products.description: In soft rose red, tempered by ice white and gentle taupe, the kasian in red displays a contemporary curved patterning. The quality fabric accentuates the neat folds of the roman shape, ensuring that this blind will look attractive wherever it's placed. Hang the red in a modern kitchen, surrounded by white units, walls, and furniture, and red accessories throughout. Source appliances and utensils in similar shades of red for a truly coordinated look that's sure to wow your family and guests alike.

products.title: Ombre Ochre Roman Blind
products.description: It's clarissa hulse's signature style and boy do we love it. This ombre roman blind design starts out light at the top and cascades down the fabric, increasing in vibrancy as it goes. The ochre tone is incredibly popular and offers a warm and interesting pop of colour to neutral it's clarissa hulse's signature style and boy do we love it.

products.title: Demoiselle Ochre Roman Blind
products.description: Glowing bright with its sunshine yellow hue, the demoiselle ochre roman blind takes a bold and vibrant fabric and adds a generous helping of harlequin chic. Elegant damselflies rest in perfect formation, the bright whiteness of their delicate wings shining out from the fabric glowing bright with its sunshine yellow hue, the demoiselle ochre roman blind takes a bold and vibrant fabric and adds a generous helping of harlequin chic.

products.title: Zeal Ochre Roman Blind
products.description: Harlequin are known for their bold, fashion forward designs, and this zeal ochre roman blind is certainly no exception. Mixed with their fresh, yet remarkably soft colour palette, this collaborative design is sure to make quite the impact in your home, but in the calmest of ways.

products.title: Paradise Raspberry Roman Blind
products.description: Were simply lost for words with this paradise raspberry roman blind. No description could ever do the punchy tones and tropical pattern justice. What we will say, though, is just how wonderful the designer of this design is. Harlequin are an absolute gem in the interiors worl were simply lost for words with this paradise raspberry roman blind.

products.title: Angle Embroidered Marshmallow Curtain
products.description: Create movement through your home with their angle embroidered marshmallow curtain inspired by bauhaus school of design this interlocking geometric design is carefully embroidered with threads of blush pink, teal blue with strokes of burnt orange and red. The linen blend base will ensure your blind sits beautifully in the room of your choice. From the prestigious abstract collection this fabric was designed to celebrate 100 years of influential hallmarks.

products.title: Menara Palm Embroidered Olive Curtain
products.description: The menara embroidered olive-green roman blind will be sure to add a sense of style to your home, perfect for any living space the delicately embroidered green trees add instant texture and depth. Hand selected from the clarke & clarke prince of persia collection, we never compromise on quality and this fabric is sure to compliment your window for years to come. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this curtain comes with their free five-year guarantee and customer-first service.

products.title: Secret Oasis Velour Rouge Curtain
products.description: Combining bold colour with a huge scale floral print the secret oasis rouge curtain is a soft velvet-feel velour fabric that will have a spectacular effect in any room. This design is a definite talking point paired with faux foliage the adventure is endless. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this curtain comes with their free five-year guarantee and customer-first service.

products.title: Aretha, Red - Roman Blind
products.description: The aretha red is cheery, stylish, and contemporary, displaying pretty shades of poppy red, bright orange, and tempered teal, alongside muted greys and olive greens. This look will work in even the most modern of homes, softening hard edges with its sweet colours and flowing paint strokes. Give the red full reign of the master bedroom, allowing it to be accented by poppy red tones with the occasional hint of of teal.

products.title: Kenton Loganberry Roman Blind
products.description: Our kenton loganberry roman blind is both beautiful and modern, the nature-inspired voyage maison design is a timeless classic and would make an elegant final touch to most home interiors. Intricate hand-painted leaves gracefully cover the blind creating a stylised look, the vi their kenton loganberry roman blind is both beautiful and modern, the nature-inspired voyage maison design is a timeless classic and would make an elegant final touch to most home interiors.

products.title: Watercolour Stripe Ochre Roller Blind
products.description: Mustard and grey is the classic combination and it's never looked more beautiful as it does in this watercolour stripe design based on a handpainted original by the inimitable clarissa hulse. Each stripe that wends its way across the fabric has a life of its on, creating individu mustard and grey is the classic combination and it's never looked more beautiful as it does in this watercolour stripe design based on a handpainted original by the inimitable clarissa hulse.

products.title: Dill Ochre Roller Blind
products.description: We're simply in love with this gorgeous ochre ombre, and those dill flowers - just wow. The design is uniquely clarissa hulse's, with that signature style of hers shining through to create a special window dressing. Of course we've added their own little blinds 2go touches to this we're simply in love with this gorgeous ochre ombre, and those dill flowers - just wow.

products.title: Ombre Ochre Roller Blind
products.description: The sunkissed tones of this ombre ochre roller blind could be just what you need to brighten up your home. Starting out light and getting ever more intense towards the bottom, this blind is brimming with style. Clarissa hulse is famed for her use of colour and ombre is her go-to the sunkissed tones of this ombre ochre roller blind could be just what you need to brighten up your home.

products.title: William Morris Strawberry Thief Sky Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring a spectacular pattern of birds, flowers and strawberries in tranquil tones, this william morris design in collaboration with the v&a, is timeless. products.title: William Morris Strawberry Thief Velvet Lustre Roman Blind
products.description: Aptly named after the thrushes that stole strawberries from the kitchen garden of his countryside home, kelmscott manor, oxfordshire, william morriss strawberry thief design is genuinely iconic. products.title: Leonardo, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: Blending the fashionable colour combination of yellow and grey with a more traditional patterning, the leonardo in ochre makes a stunning feature. Deep charcoal and light silvery greys mix with a pale mustard tone, all on a soft white background, giving a contemporary twist to a conventional pattern. Hang the ochre in a grand dining room, alongside a traditional wooden dining table and chairs, and against a grey feature wall.

products.title: Kaleidoscope, Scarlet High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: An enticing shade of red awaits every owner of this tried and trusted member of the kaleidoscope range. The high gloss finish gently shimmers in the light as the finely shaped wood takes pride of place in your home as it provides that modern reinterpretation of a timeless style. Scarlet allows you to be bold with your colour choices and let the gentle tones and colours in your room take a step back as you create a focal point.

products.title: Highbury, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: Generate a distinctive dcor scheme with the lavish highbury in ochre. Featuring a contemporary blend of slate grey, gold, and honeyed cream threads, this blind is gently woven to create an opulent looking blind with an alluring texture and an eye-catching, creative finish. Hang the ochre against a frame of slate grey or cream walls to enhance its innovative print, blending with soft furnishings and features in coordinating creams and greys.

products.description: For a warm and cosy home, this pacaya fiery red roman blind is the perfect remedy. It fuses a lovely rustic linen mix fabric with the warmest of orange shades. products.description: Modernly monochrome, in charcoal, dove, and white, the soho ochre is home to a faintly retro, soft geometric pattern, with intricately stitched thread forming a range of textures. This sturdy yet lightweight cloth drapes neatly into roman folds, creating a tidy and ordered blind with a soft edge. Team the ochre with mustard yellow to give your home office an ultra-trendy boost of colour. Choose white or dove grey walls as your base, incorporating differently textured linens, light, polished woods, and yellow ornaments and knick-knacks, continuing the uniformed theme.
